page.title: 02ST. JAMES CHURCH, GREETE.
page.content: Prebendary Gordon Thompson. This attractive Church is surrounded by a stone wall covered with ivy. The Grave yard and drive are very tidy. A notice board displayed in the front porch shows the results of the "Elections for Church Warden and Parochial Church Council".Church yard rota,cleaning rota and Quota contributions for the Parish of Greete Â£614.00.Inside the Church there is a stained glass window and some exposed beams,with brass candle holders on the end of several pews.Every fourth Sunday an average of 30 people take communion. 30 acres of glebe is rented to Ivan Horton.Canon Gordon Hopkins has been bringing a group of "campers" for 50 years. This year the campers made a new altar and a case for the pipe organ.
